text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.title: SIHYWTCAMD Configuration
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.mobsLe: Mobs don't flee if target is half health
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.zombie: Zombie-like mobs can't be damaged easily
Includes: zombie, zombie villager, husk, drowned
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.huskFi: Husks are immune to on-fire damage
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.drowne: Drowned spawn more often with a trident
Drowned have an increased velocity in water
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.skelet: Skeletons flee player if too close
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.enderm: Get blindness when staring at an enderman
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.shulke: Get blindness when hit by a shulker projectile
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.babySp: Spiders can spawn baby spiders on death
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.slimeB: Slimes can spawn with one more size
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.slimeC: Small and normal sized slimes can merge
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.blazeF: Blazes set entities on fire on collision
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.ghastI: Ghasts health is increased a lot
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.piglin: Piglins attack player if not full golden armored
Piglins can spawn riding a hoglin
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.pillag: Pillagers get more often piercing enchant
Pillagers can spawn with a speed bonus
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.vindic: Vindicators can spawn with a speed bonus
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.witchF: Witches flee player if too close
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.witchM: Witches can spawn a bit more often
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.wither: Withers can spawn wither skeletons when half health
